name: Madras
description: This preppy staple is given an upgrade with a splash of triple sec and a great big curl of orange peel. It’s the color of a summer sunset. (The New York Times)
keywords: cranberry juice, orange juice, vodka, summer

recipeInstructions.text:
Add vodka, juices and triple sec to
an ice-filled highball glass.

Stir gently
and add a splash of club soda.
Garnish with a twist of orange peel.
